text: going here with my dad on Friday <https://www.thenomadhotel.com/#!/dining/menus/dinner>

attachments.text: The NoMad Hotel is located in the heart of the historic NoMad neighborhood, North of Madison Square Park, bordered by The Flatiron District and Gramercy Park, Chelsea, and Midtown/Times Square in New York City. The NoMad Hotel has 168 guestrooms and suites – some with views of the Empire State and Flatiron Buildings. With interiors designed by Jacques Garcia, it provides a fresh modern take on the classic grand hotels of Europe with a distinct New York sensibility. The rooms are residential in feel, and decorated in his classic, timeless style and provide a counterpoint to the soaring public spaces and multiple dining areas throughout the property. The food and beverage program at The NoMad Hotel has been created by Chef-Partner Daniel Humm, and Managing Partner Will Guidara, of New York’s acclaimed Eleven Madison Park.

text: they have a roast chicken that has foie gras and black truffles stuffed under the skin.
